checklist.name: Applicant Statement (PW1)
checklist.description: Official application form signed by property owner
checklist.notes: Must be notarized if owner is not applicant

checklist.name: Site Plan with Zoning Analysis
checklist.description: Detailed site plan showing building location, setbacks, lot coverage, and zoning compliance
checklist.notes: Must show dimensions, property lines, and adjacent structures

checklist.name: Architectural Plans (Floor Plans, Elevations, Sections)
checklist.description: Complete architectural drawings showing all floor plans, building elevations, and cross-sections
checklist.notes: All drawings must be to scale and include dimensions

checklist.name: Structural Drawings and Calculations
checklist.description: Structural plans and engineering calculations sealed by PE
checklist.notes: Must include foundation, framing, and load calculations

checklist.name: Plumbing Plans
checklist.description: Plumbing system layout and riser diagrams
checklist.notes: Show all fixtures, pipes, and connections to utilities

checklist.name: Mechanical/HVAC Plans
checklist.description: Heating, ventilation, and air conditioning system plans
checklist.notes: Include equipment schedules and load calculations

checklist.name: Electrical Plans
checklist.description: Electrical system layout, panel schedules, and load calculations
checklist.notes: Must show panel locations, circuits, and service entrance

checklist.name: Fire Alarm and Sprinkler Plans
checklist.description: Fire protection system plans including alarms and sprinklers
checklist.notes: Required for most commercial and multi-family buildings

checklist.name: Energy Code Compliance (ECC1)
checklist.description: NYC Energy Conservation Code compliance documentation
checklist.notes: Use DOB's ECC1 form or approved alternative

checklist.name: Environmental Assessment (if applicable)
checklist.description: Environmental review documentation for applicable projects
checklist.notes: May require Phase I/II Environmental Site Assessment

conditionalRequirement.condition: Required for projects subject to CEQR or involving hazardous materials

checklist.name: Landmarks Preservation Commission Approval
checklist.description: LPC approval for work in designated historic districts
checklist.notes: Check if property is in a historic district before applying

conditionalRequirement.condition: Required only for buildings in historic districts or individual landmarks

checklist.name: Sidewalk Shed Plans
checklist.description: Temporary sidewalk protection plans if construction affects pedestrian areas
checklist.notes: Separate permit may be required from DOT

conditionalRequirement.condition: Required if construction work affects public right-of-way

fees.calculationMethod: Based on construction cost and building type
